name: Hide (Archive)
description:
I DID NOT MAKE THIS GAME!

This game was originally made by Andrew Shouldice (i think)

Available for windows and mac.

Link to their youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC-pJIJT2tiyquQH7r67DgA

The reason for this being re uploaded here is because the original download link for the game was deleted as the website for it went down a while back.

I managed to get this through wayback machine.

This game is not intended to take credit or copy this persons work. This was simply made for archival purposes.
